EmailTemplate.name: 202011_Global_HAT_Buy-More_Sneak-Preview.Sneak-Preview
EmailTemplate.subject: Sneak Preview: Download HAT’s Cyber Monday Sale, Complete with Pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cyber Monday is right around the corner and it’s another opportunity for us to offer you an extra 50% off. We have put thousands of massively discounted Honeywell surplus parts for purchase through Honeywell Aerospace Trading.
Use promo code CYBER (checkout directly on GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/discount.html]]>). For your convenience, you can download the available parts list WITH PRICING by clicking here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/CYBER.xlsx]]>.
For us, the occasions to offer you great deals are many, and we suggest that you keep checking GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/discount.html]]> for these. You’ll be pleasantly surprised that you don’t need to wait a whole year for Cyber Monday to get special offers, because at HAT we do it just every other Monday! SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/discount.html]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Timi Reed-Jeske Sales Leader Honeywell Aerospace Trading
